reviews.Title: Must buy!
reviews.Comment:
The phone is an actual testament of Ultra, Pro, and Max. You get it right. Feels so good in hand. People with shorter hands please avoid. Buy only if you can leverage on professional front with a lot of multitasking and note writing. Don't forget to buy S pen case for fold 5 via Samsung Shop or offline stores, works like magic, I got mine delivered before the phone üòÄ

A TRUE 5 Star performance, camera and display üëè
